modName: Vivien van Vaalen - The schizophrenic seductress
summary: This Mod adds a female standalone follower. Her name is Vivien van Vaalen and she is a mage fighting with fire and ice.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=16][color=green]Vivien Van Vaalen – The schizophrenic seductress[/color][/size]
by TheXaman


[heading][color=green]>>Description[/color][/heading]
This is my first mod and it adds a female standalone follower called Vivien Van Vaalen. She is a mage fighting with fire and ice. Vivien can be found at the „Sleeping Giant Inn“ in Riverwood. Currently she acts like a normal follower, but that will change in the futur. Additionaly a questline will be added which explains her background and the reason for her schizophrenia.


[heading][color=green]>> Futur Plans[/color][/heading]
- Custom clothing
- Questline explaining her background[/center]



[heading][color=green]>> Manual installation[/color][/heading]
1. Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files
2. Find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim
3. Move all files into the Data folder in your Skyrim installation folder
4. Merge the folder when asked, nothing should be replaced
5. Start the Skyrim Launcher, go to the „Data Files“ Tab and tick VivianVanVaalen.esp
6. Start the game and enjoy!


[heading][color=green]>> Manual unistallation[/color][/heading]
skyrimDataVivienVanVaalen.esp * Delete file *
skyrimDatatexturesVivianVanVaalen * Delete complete folder *
skyrimDatameshesVivienVanVaalen * Delete complete folder *
skyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintVivienVanVaalen.esp * Delete complete folder *
skyrimDatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomVivienVanVaalen.esp * Delete complete folder *


[heading][color=green]>> Tools used[/color][/heading]
NifSkope
Creation Kit by Bethesda
TexBlend by Caliente
BoddySlide by Caliente
